TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Gouge
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the effect duration of your Gouge ability by [@value] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Sinister Strike
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the Energy cost of your Sinister Strike ability by [@value].

TalentsTiers.Name: Dual Wield Specialization
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the damage done by your offhand weapon by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Slice and Dice
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the duration of your Slice and Dice ability by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Deflection
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your chance to parry by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Precision
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your chance to hit with all spells and attacks by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Endurance
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the cooldown of your Sprint and Evasion abilities by [@value] sec and increases your total Stamina by [@value2]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Riposte
TalentsTiers.Description:
10 Energy
Melee Range

Instant
6 sec cooldown

A strike that becomes active after parrying an opponent's attack. This attack deals 150% weapon damage and slows their melee attack speed by 20% for 30 sec. Awards 1 combo point.

TalentsTiers.Name: Close Quarters Combat
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your chance to get a critical strike with Daggers and Fist Weapons by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Kick
TalentsTiers.Description: Gives your Kick ability a [@value]% chance to silence the target for [@value2] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Sprint
TalentsTiers.Description: Gives a [@value]% chance to remove all movement imparing effects when you activate your Sprint ability.

TalentsTiers.Name: Lightning Reflexes
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your Dodge chance by [@value]% and gives you [@value2]% melee haste.

TalentsTiers.Name: Aggression
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the damage of your Sinister Strike, Backstab, and Eviscerate abilities by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Mace Specialization
TalentsTiers.Description: Your attacks with maces ignore up to [@value]% of your opponents armor.

TalentsTiers.Name: Blade Flurry
TalentsTiers.Description:
25 Energy
Instant
2 min cooldown
Increases your attack speed by 20%. In addition, attacks strike an additional nearby opponent. Lasts 15 sec. This ability is usable while shapeshifted.

TalentsTiers.Name: Sword Specialization
TalentsTiers.Description: Gives you a [@value]% chance to get an extra attack on the same target after hitting your target with your One-Handed Sword or One-Handed Axe.

TalentsTiers.Name: Weapon Expertise
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your expertise by [@value].

TalentsTiers.Name: Blade Twisting
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the damage dealt by Sinister Strike and Backstab by [@value]% and your damaging melee attacks have a [@value]% chance to Daze the target for [@value3] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Vitality
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your Energy regeneration rate by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Adrenaline Rush
TalentsTiers.Description:
3 min cooldown
Increases your Energy regeneration rate by 100% for 15 sec. This ability is usable while shapeshifted.

TalentsTiers.Name: Nerves of Steel
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the damage taken while affected by Stun and Fear effects by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Throwing Specialization
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the range of Throw and Deadly Throw by [@value] yards and gives your Deadly Throw and Fan of Knives abilities a [@value2]% chance to interrupt the target for [@value3] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Combat Potency
TalentsTiers.Description: Gives your successful off-hand melee attacks a [@value]% chance to generate [@value2] Energy.

TalentsTiers.Name: Unfair Advantage
TalentsTiers.Description: Whenever you dodge an attack you gain an Unfair Advantage, striking back for [@value]% of your main hand weapon's damage. This cannot occur more than once per second.

TalentsTiers.Name: Surprise Attacks
TalentsTiers.Description: Your finishing moves can no longer be dodged, and the damage dealt by your Sinister Strike, Backstab, Shiv, Hemorrhage and Gouge abilities is increased by 10%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Savage Combat
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your total attack power by [@value]% and all physical damage caused to enemies you have poisoned is increased by [@value2]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Prey on the Weak
TalentsTiers.Description: Your critical strike damage is increased by [@value]% when the target has less health than you (as a percentage of total health).

TalentsTiers.Name: Killing Spree
TalentsTiers.Description:
10 yd range
Instant
2 min cooldown
Step through the shadows from enemy to enemy within 10 yards, attacking an enemy every .5 secs with both weapons until 5 assaults are made. Can hit the same target multiple times. Cannot hit invisible or stealthed targets.
